job.title: Freelance Data Scientist
job.description:
Data Scientist
closerlook is looking for an analytics professional with strong quantitative abilities, effective communication skills and an understanding of how statistics drives marketing optimization to join our rapidly expanding Analytics practice. We work in closer partnership with agency competencies (e.g. strategy, creative, account management) and with our pharmaceutical clients to measure cross-channel marketing effectiveness and fuel data-driven strategic and creative optimization. Our deliverables include:
Cross-Channel Marketing Effectiveness & ROICRM & Sales Audience Targeting
Creative Optimization
Cross-Channel Marketing Strategy
Measurement and Reporting
Modeling and Segmentation
Analytic Software Solutions
Responsibilities:
Develop predictive models that increase the efficiency and effectiveness of Client database-driven CRM initiatives.
Develop advanced analytic techniques such as ROI calculations, KPI forecasting and database segmentation
Recommend and execute modeling and advanced analytic techniques that enhance client marketing intelligence
Perform data preparation, model design, and model maintenance.
Develop and foster agency partnerships that fuel client value
Requirements:
Degree in statistics or quantitative field (e.g. engineering, computer science, math, economics, social sciences).
Comprehensive understanding of statistical techniques (linear and logistic regression, clustering, natural language process, etc.) used for modeling, segmentation, text mining and in-depth quantitative analysis.
Technical Knowledge: Proficient coding skills (Python, R, SQL, etc), and experience working in a Unix environment. Proficiency in database management and large datasets: create, edit, update, join, append and query data from columnar and big data platforms.
A minimum of 1-3 years’ experience in analytics, data-science, data-driven strategy, quantitative research, and/or management consulting work
Good understanding of cloud computing and infrastructure concepts
Experience with one or more big data tools and technologies like Snowflake, Databricks, S3, Hadoop, Spark
Experience working with NLP applications is a plus
Strong communication and presentation skills
Innovative, entrepreneurial thinker who can both develop and implement new analytic capabilities
Experience with CRM and database marketing techniques, tools, and processes is a plus
Agency and Client Management experience is a plus
ABOUT CLOSERLOOK, INC.
closerlook is a new type of marketing agency that helps biopharma brands make a difference in the lives of patients and those who care for them.
We focus on what matters most—the combination of better patient outcomes and bigger business impact.
Learn more at closerlook.com
